resources.string: To help accommodate the limited space of a widget, you can optionally override the card template used and pick out just one field for the front or back; the card type from the deck is still used internally for review/learning-tracking purposes. If you leave one of the following fields empty, the normal template for the card will be used.
Note field/card template on front of card:
Note field/card template on back of card:
Lockscreen First Note Field / Card Template:
Lockscreen Second Note Field / Card Template:
Launcher First Note Field / Card Template:
Launcher Second Note Field / Card Template:
Always same note for lockscreen and launcher
Use individual note fields instead of card templates
Use note fields (not card templates) in lockscreen
Use note fields (not card templates) in launcher
